body: I want to know how the YML is made to the maps that are posted on the forum, if someone can explain me how to do or have the link to a tutorial would greatly appreciate it =)
body_tagged: I want to know how the YML is made to the maps that are posted on the forum, if someone can explain me how to do or have the link to a tutorial would greatly appreciate it =)
title: As does The YML for maps?

replies.body: Look also other problem is that I am Spanish and I can not understand the perfecion everything written there, haci so the tutorial.
replies.body_tagged: Look also other problem is that I am Spanish and I can not understand the perfecion everything written there, haci so the tutorial.

replies.body:
Try to google translate it so you understand some of the basics of what the docs say. Unfortunately, we do not yet have documentation in spanish. Sorry!

EDIT: Also, the YAML itself is english based, however I can try to translate that for you! Do your best.
replies.body_tagged:
Try to google translate it so you understand some of the basics of what the docs say. Unfortunately, we do not yet have documentation in spanish. Sorry!

EDIT: Also, the YAML itself is english based, however I can try to translate that for you! Do your best.

replies.body: but something else I do not understand is where do I start?, whether as YAML structure but not how to do it and what program or?
replies.body_tagged: but something else I do not understand is where do I start?, whether as YAML structure but not how to do it and what program or?

replies.body: You can use any text editor you want, I reccomend Notepad++.
replies.body_tagged: You can use any text editor you want, I reccomend Notepad++.

replies.body: I have a question what does YML stand for??
replies.body_tagged: I have a question what does YML stand for??

reply_to.body: You can use any text editor you want, I reccomend Notepad++.
reply_to.body_tagged: You can use any text editor you want, I reccomend Notepad++.

replies.body: It's a bit confusing but it stands "YAML ain't a markup language", however it has been referenced to in the past as "Yet another markup language". Not entirely sure on this, but google has some other variants.
replies.body_tagged: It's a bit confusing but it stands "YAML ain't a markup language", however it has been referenced to in the past as "Yet another markup language". Not entirely sure on this, but google has some other variants.

replies.body:
Estas de suerte. Yo hablo español y es mi idioma principal :)
Si deseas aprender algo de YML puedes contactarme en Skype (evoclaws).
Sera un gusto ayudarte! ^_^

replies.body: Hey, estoy Mostaza. A YML es lo que nuestros mapas ejecutan. Le da a todo el mundo en su punto, los elementos en el inventario, los equipos, los objetivos y los objetivos nombres desovar. Los objetivos son los monumentos que rompes en nebulosa. Usted puede hacer mucho más con el código de YML. Usted puede hacer hologramas, objetos encantados, Custom Objetivo o nombres de los equipos, incluso se puede tener un montón de diversión con ella! Puede haber algunos problemas en él, a veces, pero cuando descubrieron que se fija inmediatamente. Usted puede aprender lo básico en www.docs.avicus.net. Si usted está teniendo problemas para leer el Inglés no sólo traducir todo Inglés aquí: www.translate.google.com. Si alguna vez necesitas ayuda mi skype es Comandante de la mostaza! Gaming feliz! ^ _ ^
